title: Irelia
body: Ire doesn´t get movementspeed on her R with Trinityf. Planed?

replies.body:
Trinity Forces movement speed is triggered by autoattacks, not spells. So yes, it's normal that Irelias R doesn't trigger it. 

> Unique â€“ Rage: Basic attacks (on-hit) grant +20 flat movement speed for 2 seconds. Killing a Unit grants +60 flat movement speed instead.

Well ty for the information.
RIP epic escaps.
